root.title: Data.Bool
root.description: The Data.Bool class is responsible for the handling of boolean values, that can be PHP-defined constants True and False.

method.description: Returns true if both the value of the object and of the received expression are true. Otherwise false.
Returns true if any of the values, of the object, or of the received expression are true. Otherwise false.
Returns true if only one of the values is true, between the value of the object and the received expression. Otherwise false.
Different of. Requires all the values to be of the same type and derived from Eq typeclass.
Compares equality. Requires all the values to be of the same type and derived from Eq typeclass.

method.signature: greaterOrEq :: (Eq a, Ord a) => (a, a) -> Bool
method.description: Returns if the value of this object is greater or equal to the value of received value. Must be derived from Ord typeclass and, obviously, derived from Eq typeclass.
method.code: Int (1) -> greaterOrEq (Int (10)); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (false) } Str ('Z') -> greaterOrEq (Str ('Z')); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (true) }

method.description: Returns if the value of this object is greater than the received object. Deriving Ord.
method.code: Int (1) -> greaterThan (Int (1)); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (false) } Float (10.0) -> greaterThan (8.34); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (true) }

method.description: The closure passed as parameter is performed if the value of this object is true.
The closure passed as parameter is performed if the value of this object is false.

method.signature: lesserOrEq :: (Eq a, Ord a) => (a, a) -> Bool
method.description: Returns if the value of this object is lesser or equal to the value of the received object. Deriving Ord, Eq.
method.code: Int (1) -> lesserOrEq (Int (10)); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (true) } Str ('Z') -> lesserOrEq (Str ('Z')); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (true) }

method.description: Returns if the value of this object is lesser than the value of the received object. Deriving Ord.
method.code: Int (1) -> lesserThan (Int (1)); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (false) } Float (10.0) -> lesserThan (8.34); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (false) }

method.description: Negates the value of the object.
method.code: Bool (True) -> not (); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (false) } Bool (False) -> not (); # Object (Data\Bool) { value: bool (true) }
